subject: Re: FW: New User Sign-in using Single-Sign-On
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Hey @DEWITT Derek A ddewitt@eugene-or.gov  - So sorry to inform you but it doesn't look like there is a setting to disable this. I am going to make a product request and assign you to it (just in case anyone in the future reaches out about it). We should definitely have that capability...thanks for sending it over. 

On Thu, Jun 5, 2025 at 1:00?PM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Example of each sign on we are receiving

	 

	Detective D. DeWitt

	Financial Crimes Unit

	Special Weapons and Tactics Team

	Background Investigations Team

	Eugene Police Department

	300 County Club Road

	Eugene, OR 97401

	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

	Work Cell � 541-743-6192

	 

	From: hello=flocksafety.com@mail.flocksafety.com flocksafety.com@mail.flocksafety.com  <hello=flocksafety.com@mail.flocksafety.com flocksafety.com@mail.flocksafety.com > On Behalf Of hello@flocksafety.com hello@flocksafety.com 
	Sent: Thursday, June 5, 2025 12:03 PM
	To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: New User Sign-in using Single-Sign-On

	 

	[EXTERNAL ?]

 

 <https://flock-public-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/flock-safety-dark-green-logo.png> 

 

	 

 

Welcome to the Flock

 

A new user has signed up for Flock and connected to your organization through single sign on. Please review the following details. 

	
Name: SOLANO Mara X 

Email: MSolano@eugene-or.gov MSolano@eugene-or.gov  

Role: Patrol Officer's / CSO 

 

	
 

 

	 

 

 

Problems or questions?

Gaby Mahoney
